summary: This document is an email correspondence regarding the account opening process for Jeffrey Epstein at TD Ameritrade. It discusses the need for additional documentation to confirm the existence of Southern Financial, LLC, and requests further identification verification from Epstein to proceed with the account setup.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual attempting to open an account with TD Ameritrade, and the correspondence is directed to him regarding the account setup.

persons.name: Ravin H
persons.context: Ravin H is the representative from TD Ameritrade who is communicating with Epstein regarding the account opening process and the required documentation.

connections.description: Ravin H is providing account services to Jeffrey Epstein as part of the account opening process at TD Ameritrade.

keyFacts: The email discusses the need for additional documentation to confirm the existence of Southern Financial, LLC.
TD Ameritrade requires Epstein to provide a copy of his Articles of Incorporation for the LLC.
Epstein's account is restricted from trading until the requested information is provided.
The document mentions a deadline of 30 days for Epstein to submit the required information to avoid account closure.
A U.S. Passport was attached to the email as part of the identification verification process.
